meta.name: description
meta.content: Aristoi Classical Academy is a free, public K-12th grade charter school in Katy, Texas.

meta.content: Aristoi charter academy, Classical Education, charter schools katy, classical charter schools katy, classical education, K-12 school

span.span: Provides a Classical Liberal Arts Education
Cultivates a thriving community of faculty, students, and parents

div.div: Brought to you by TEA and Aristoi's Counseling Office

h3.a: (UPDATE) COVID-19 Information & Resources

div.div: In response to the COVID-19 virus, and in order to keep our students and faculty safe, Aristoi Classical Academy will be closed through May 4th. Please know that the Administration is in constant contact with TEA and is following the directives of Governor Abbott. Please click the "Read full story" button for a variety of resources for students and parents which are updated daily.
